item.title: Quick Start Guide
item.description: This intro only documents a subset of Cryogen's features. For additional documentation please see the cryogen site.Features

item.title: Moving to Signal
item.description: I've decided to move ~exclusively to Signal after the latest WhatsApp privacy policy changes.Have I read it? No, I actually have not even received the warning as my phone's memory is full and I'm running and older version of WhatsApp.
